recommended_degree: Administrasi Bisnis, Manajemen, Statistik, Sains Data, Teknik Komputer dan Jaringan (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_description:
1. Timekeeping & Attendance Management
- Check employee timesheets through Looker Studio and ensure all employees complete their timesheet daily.
- Monitor and verify daily employee attendance (clock in/out) in HRIS.
- Export and prepare attendance data (26â€“25 period) including presence, leave, permission, and sick records for payroll processing.
- Approve attendance requests in HRIS.

2. Employee Claims & Certification Support
- Check employee claims on Praisepal, ensure accuracy, recap the total claims, and verify that expenses are within budget limits.
- Assist HR in registering employees for certification tests, confirm test dates/times, and coordinate required information with employees.
- Coordinate with DevDat team regarding certifications, Microsoft certification links, and operational matters.

3. Asset & Inventory Management
- Maintain and update laptop asset inventory, including condition checks and charging status.
- Communicate with vendors or service centers regarding laptop repairs or maintenance.
- Handle procurement for new laptops or good-use units based on user requests.

4. Software & Tools Management
- Check and process payments for tools/software used by Company.
- Create new company emails through Google Administrator, including password setup, backup codes, and sharing access with HR/users.

5. Data Management & Reporting
- Export billing hit usage data from GA4 for each registered client and upload it to the company drive for admin/finance processing.
- Export WFH & WFO data from HRIS to support reimbursement calculations for finance.
